trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The ManipulationDeltaEventArgs class contains data about changes in the position of a manipulation.
trans-unit.target: ManipulationDeltaEventArgs 類別包含相關操作的位置變更資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.DeltaManipulation%2A> property contains the changes that occurred since the last <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.DeltaManipulation%2A>屬性包含自上次發生的變更<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.DeltaManipulation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.CumulativeManipulation%2A> property contains the total changes that occurred for the current manipulation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.CumulativeManipulation%2A>屬性包含目前的操作時發生的總變更。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.CumulativeManipulation%2A>

trans-unit.source: You use one of those properties to transform the manipulated object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用其中一個屬性來轉換操作的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can end a manipulation by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.Complete%2A> method or force the manipulation into inertia by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.StartInertia%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由呼叫來結束操作<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.Complete%2A>方法或強制成藉由呼叫慣性操作<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.StartInertia%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.StartInertia%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.Complete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Cancels the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 取消操作。

trans-unit.source: If the method succeeds, the default <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> sends previous touch events as mouse down or mouse move events to the element and future manipulation events do not occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，預設值<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>先前傳送為滑鼠的事件觸碰滑鼠移動事件的項目或未來的操作事件，並不會。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: Touch cannot be promoted to mouse events if the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationCompleted> event occurs during inertia.
trans-unit.target: 觸控不可提升為滑鼠事件，如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationCompleted>慣性期間發生的事件。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the manipulation was successfully canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>已成功取消操作。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Completes the manipulation without inertia.
trans-unit.target: 完成不慣性操作。

trans-unit.source: You can call the Complete method to end the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫來結束之操作的完整方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, when an object reaches the edge of a window, you can call Complete to prevent the object from going off the screen.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，當物件達到視窗邊緣時，您可以呼叫完成，以便防止物件移出螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cumulated changes of the current manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的操作的累積的變更。

trans-unit.source: The CumulativeManipulation property contains the total changes that occurred for the current manipulation.
trans-unit.target: CumulativeManipulation 屬性包含目前的操作時發生的總變更。

trans-unit.source: You can use CumulativeManipulation to transform the manipulated object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 CumulativeManipulation 轉換操作的物件。

trans-unit.source: The cumulated changes of the current manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 目前的操作的累積的變更。

trans-unit.source: Gets the most recent changes of the current manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的操作最新變更。

trans-unit.source: The DeltaManipulation property contains the changes that occurred since the last <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: DeltaManipulation 屬性包含自上次發生的變更<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to transform the manipulated object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來操作的物件的轉換。

trans-unit.source: The most recent changes of the current manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 目前的操作最新的變更。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta"></xref> event occurs during inertia.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta"></xref>慣性期間發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event occurs during inertia or while the user has contact with the element that receives the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來判斷是否<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>慣性期間，或當使用者擁有與收到的項目，就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>事件。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta"></xref> event occurs during inertia; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the event occurs while the user has contact with the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta"></xref>慣性; 期間發生的事件<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>事件發生時的使用者具有與連絡<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the container that defines the coordinates for the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 取得定義來處理座標的容器。

trans-unit.source: The container that defines the coordinates for the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 定義來處理座標容器。

trans-unit.source: Gets the point from which the manipulation originated.
trans-unit.target: 取得操作的起始點。

trans-unit.source: The point from which the manipulation originated.
trans-unit.target: 操作的起始點。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of objects that represents the touch contacts for the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示觸控連絡人來處理物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of objects that represents the touch contacts for the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 表示觸控連絡人來處理物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the manipulation has gone beyond certain boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 指定操作已進入特定界限以外。

trans-unit.source: Use the ReportBoundaryFeedback method to indicate that an element has moved beyond a certain boundary.
trans-unit.target: 表示項目已移到特定的界限之外使用 ReportBoundaryFeedback 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user moves an element outside of the bounds of a <xref:System.Windows.Window>, you can call this method to report that to the window.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果使用者移的界限之外的項目<xref:System.Windows.Window>，您可以呼叫這個方法，以在視窗中的報告。</xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: When you call ReportBoundaryFeedback, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationBoundaryFeedback> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫 ReportBoundaryFeedback，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationBoundaryFeedback>就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationBoundaryFeedback>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> subscribes to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationBoundaryFeedback> event to provide visual feedback to the user that a boundary has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Window>訂閱<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationBoundaryFeedback>事件來提供給使用者，已達到界限的視覺化回饋。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationBoundaryFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: You can subscribe to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationBoundaryFeedback> to implement custom behavior.
trans-unit.target: 您可以訂閱<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationBoundaryFeedback>來實作自訂行為。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationBoundaryFeedback>

trans-unit.source: The portion of the manipulation that represents moving beyond the boundary.
trans-unit.target: 代表超出界限移動操作部分。

trans-unit.source: unusedManipulation is .
trans-unit.target: unusedManipulationis .

trans-unit.source: Starts inertia on the manipulation by ignoring subsequent contact movements and raising the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 在操作中忽略後續連絡移動並引發的開始慣性<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rates of the most recent changes to the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 取得操作的最新變更的率。

trans-unit.source: The rates of the most recent changes to the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 管理最新變更的速率。
